name: City Catformer
description:
You are a cat lost in a city. You have to find your way to your owners, but cities are dangerous places! Best avoid the road and find an alternate route.

Controls: WASD and spacebar to jump.

Made for the Global Game Jam januray 29-31 2021. Made with BabylonJS!

Link to GGJ page with source code and downloads: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/city-catformer-8

I may work on this some more in the future.
